thread.section_title: Travelup Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.travelup.co.uk | 46 of 1272
thread.title: Nwabueze Okoroafo

author: Nwabueze Okoroafo
title: Nwabueze Okoroafo
text:
I bought a ticket to Lagos on Arik Air, the staff would not help me process my refund. The female staff I spoke witb initially was and even denied responsibility of refund. She would not even give me the airline contact details to call them.
I am very disappointed as a customer who buys my ticket from you all the time I travel. I still want my refund please. I don't even know why I paid for another ticket via your agency.
Please refund my initial ticket with Arikair.
